text: l color 90% Abnormality of dental enamel 90% Abnormality of retinal pigmentation 90% Nystagmus 90% Photophobia 90% Visual impairment 90% Optic atrophy 50% Amelogenesis imperfecta - Autosomal recessive inheritance - Carious teeth - Cone/cone-rod dystrophy - Monochromacy - Nyctalopia - Optic disc pallor - The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom occurs in a condition. Much of this information comes from Orphanet, a European rare disease database.
